item.title: Model Fusion through Bayesian Optimization in Language Model Fine-Tuning
item.description: Bayesian Optimization Model Fusion (BOMF) significantly boosts language model fine-tuning by optimizing both loss and metrics through multi-objective Bayesian optimization, yielding considerable perfo…

item.title: Provable Benefit of Cutout and CutMix for Feature Learning
item.description: CutMix and Cutout data augmentation methods provably improve feature learning by enabling the network to learn rarer features and noise vectors more effectively.

item.title: TrackIME: Enhanced Video Point Tracking via Instance Motion Estimation
item.description: TrackIME enhances video point tracking by cleverly pruning the search space, resulting in improved accuracy and efficiency.
